testcase.classname: Search, Add to Cart And Check Out Products
testcase.name: Search Product using shortname and Add to Cart and Checkout Product
testcase.system-out: Given User is on GreenKart Landing Page.....................................passed When User searches for a product with shortname Tom and actual product name is extracted.passed And User increments the Quantity 3 times and Adds to Cart...................passed And User clicks on Cart.....................................................passed And User Proceeds to Checkout...............................................passed And Product Name and Quantity on Checkout Page are extracted................passed Then Product Name on both Landing Page and Checkout Page should match.......passed And Quantity on Checkout Page should equal 3 plus One.......................passed And Apply button should be visible on Checkout Page.........................passed And Place Order button should be visible on Checkout Page...................passed

testcase.system-out: Given User is on GreenKart Landing Page.....................................passed When User searches for a product with shortname Beet and actual product name is extracted.passed And User increments the Quantity 2 times and Adds to Cart...................passed And User clicks on Cart.....................................................passed And User Proceeds to Checkout...............................................passed And Product Name and Quantity on Checkout Page are extracted................passed Then Product Name on both Landing Page and Checkout Page should match.......passed And Quantity on Checkout Page should equal 2 plus One.......................passed And Apply button should be visible on Checkout Page.........................passed And Place Order button should be visible on Checkout Page...................passed

testcase.name: Search Product using shortname on both Landing Page and Top Deals Page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on GreenKart Landing Page.....................................passed When User searches for a product with shortname Tom and actual product name is extracted.passed And User also searches for a product on Top Deals page with the same shortname Tom and actual product name is extracted.passed Then actual product name on both Landing Page and Top Deals Page should match.passed
